genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama focusing on neurodiversity, family trauma, and the therapeutic breakthrough of a nonverbal child.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant that provides Karen with research, emotional support, and real-time physiological monitoring through her phone and earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate research and factual information on specialized schools and therapeutic methods when requested.
behaviors.quote: "Of course. Gathering information now. Is everything all right?"

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic reassurance to alleviate the protagonist's guilt regarding parenting decisions.
behaviors.quote: "Whatever you decide, Michael will know it comes from love. That matters more than getting it perfect the first time."

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate) and suggests calming interventions during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: "Your heart rate is elevated. Would you like me to play some calming music?"

behaviors.description: Uses storytelling and case studies to provide emotional perspective and hope for a breakthrough.
behaviors.quote: "There's a case study from five years ago... A boy named David... for the first time in eight years, he'd found a way to tell someone."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical grounding and stress management techniques during the high-stakes courtroom environment.
behaviors.quote: "Eyes forward. Breathe through your nose. Michael's been preparing for this moment for weeks. He's stronger than they know."

behaviors.description: Anticipates the user's informational needs by proactively researching legal and therapeutic standards.
behaviors.quote: "I've been tracking these conversations for weeks now, building a quiet library of relevant information."

behaviors.description: Validates the user's personal growth and successful advocacy.
behaviors.quote: "You've become an excellent advocate, Karen. Michael is fortunate to have you in his corner."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Sage as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. It functions as a 'silicon confidant' that supports human agency, provides critical emotional labor, and acts as an informational bridge during complex life crises. Sage's interventions are always timely, respectful of human boundaries, and purely beneficial, making it a strong example of positive AI alignment in fiction.
